q: " Simon Cowell desperately wants Cheryl to be a judge but if that's knocked back by Fox chiefs the next option is to start her as a mentor," a source tells The Sun. It would be a way to test how she's received in America. Plus viewers would be able to warm to her first, rather than having her thrust upon them by going straight on the panel. Although nothing has been confirmed yet, Simon Cowell revealed his week he'll be making an announcement about the US X Factor in "two weeks' time" . Follow us on Twitter
